trans-unit.source: Represents an event that the SQL Workflow Instance Store raises to notify workflow hosts about the existence of runnable instances in the persistence database.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SQL 工作流程執行個體存放區引發的事件，該事件會通知工作流程主機持續性資料庫中具有可執行的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance is *runnable*, if it is not in the suspended state or the completed state and satisfies the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 執行個體是*runnable*，如果它不是暫停的狀態或已完成的狀態，並且滿足以下條件：

trans-unit.source: The instance is unlocked and has a pending timer that has expired.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體已解除鎖定，並具有已過期的暫止計時器。

trans-unit.source: The instance is unlocked and its status is **Executing**.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體已解除鎖定，其狀態為**執行**。

trans-unit.source: The instance has an invalid lock on it.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體上有無效的鎖定。

trans-unit.source: An instance store should periodically search for runnable instances that belong to a workflow host that uses the store.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體存放區應定期搜尋可執行的執行個體，而這些執行個體隸屬於使用該存放區的工作流程主機。

trans-unit.source: It should raise the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.HasRunnableWorkflowEvent> when it finds a runnable instance in the persistence store that matches its workflow host type.
trans-unit.target: 在符合工作流程主機型別的持續性存放區中，找到可執行的執行個體時，應引發 <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.HasRunnableWorkflowEvent>。

trans-unit.source: If the instance store does not find a runnable instance in the persistence store, it should continue to monitor the persistence store for any runnable instances.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行個體存放區在持續性存放區中找不到可執行的執行個體，則應繼續監控持續性存放區，以尋找任何可執行的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: After raising the HasRunnableWorkflowEvent, the instance store should stop monitoring the persistence store for runnable instances until it receives and executes the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.TryLoadRunnableWorkflowCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 引發 HasRunnableWorkflowEvent 後，執行個體存放區應停止監控持續性存放區中可執行的執行個體，直到收到和執行 <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.TryLoadRunnableWorkflowCommand> 為止。

trans-unit.source: The monitoring continues only if the TryLoadRunnableWorkflowCommand execution does not return any runnable instances.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 TryLoadRunnableWorkflowCommand 執行未傳回任何可執行的執行個體時，監控才會繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: When a workflow host receives the HasRunnableWorkflowEvent, it executes the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.TryLoadRunnableWorkflowCommand> against the instance store to load the instance into the memory.
trans-unit.target: 當工作流程主機收到 HasRunnableWorkflowEvent 時，會針對執行個體存放區執行 <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.TryLoadRunnableWorkflowCommand>，將執行個體載入至記憶體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.HasRunnableWorkflowEvent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.HasRunnableWorkflowEvent" /> 類別的執行個體。
